Batman: Brave and The Bold (TV Series)
The Legion of Superheroes (TV Series)
Teen Titans (The Comics)
Teen Titans (The Cartoon Series)

1.title: Welcome!

choices: Superman (Clark Kent/Kal-El)
Batman (Bruce Wayne)
The Flash (Wally West)
Jimmy Olsen (Bonus choice)
11.content: Alright then, next pick a character for the Muscle Growth to happen to.
11.title: Justice League/Justice League Unlimited (TV Ser...

choices: Jimmy's muscles grow in the form of growth spurts.
Jimmy’s muscles increase ten times faster than a normal human being.
114.content:
A mighty explosion had taken place inside of a chemical plant located on an industrial compound, setting off a huge fire! Several fire engines were called to the scene, along with police and ambulance units. The reporters at the Daily Planet were listening in on the police scanner also heard the news, and Perry White had sent Lois over to get the story, and Jimmy Olsen to take pictures.

Lois arrived there first, with Andrew James the camera man. She set up the live TV camera just outside, since she couldn’t get any closer due to the smoke and the fire. Police units had the entire area blocked off, but the burning building had provided a stunning backdrop for her live report.

In the meantime, Jimmy had parked his small car in the back of the large plant, and he managed to sneak inside through a cargo delivery door. He turned on the flash on his camera, and he immediately started taking pictures inside of the plant. The fire was apparently on the other side of the building, or so it seemed that way.

While Jimmy was roaming around the plant, Superman had just arrived on the scene. The fire had gotten out of control, and the Man of Steel managed to rip off several plates of steel, using his heat vision to solder the plates together to create a large steel bucket. He flew the bucket over to the nearby lake, scooping up hundreds of gallons of cold water, before flying back to the fire and dousing the flames with a large quantity of water!

Meanwhile, Jimmy walked past a large machine, which was damaged by the fire. As he approached it, he raised up the camera to take its picture. Just then, the machine short-circuited, and a mighty blast of energy was emitted from the machine, which struck Jimmy in the chest! The energy blast was blue and red-colored, and it caused the machine to overload! This was followed by a loud explosion, which left Jimmy lying unconscious on the hard, concrete floor!

BOOOM!

“What was that?” Superman said, as he heard the explosion.

The Man of Steel ran into the plant at super speed, only to find Jimmy Olsen, on the floor. He picked up Jimmy and his camera, and flew him out of there, just before the machine exploded!

Minutes later, Jimmy was rushed to a hospital, with Lois and Clark standing by his side. A doctor had examined him, and had determined that Jimmy had been exposed to some sort of chemical radiation. So far, they thought that Jimmy would be okay; however, they wanted to keep him for a few days, in case there were any side-effects…
114.title: Jimmy Olsen (Bonus choice)

choices: Jimmy's muscles continue to grow the next day at home
Jimmy tests his strength on the weight bench at home
1142.content:
Lois Lane and Clark Kent were sitting on two chairs in the small room in the hospital, looking on at the boy with red, curly hair who was lying down on the big hospital bed. Jimmy Olsen had been unconscious for about three hours when he finally began to open his eyes, followed by a loud groan.

“Uhhhh… My head hurts! What the hell happened?” he moaned, as he turned his head and looked around the room. “Where am I?”

“You’re in the hospital right now, Jimmy! You were at the chemical plant, and one of the machines had zapped you with some chemical beam of radiation or something and it knocked you out! We don’t know what happened, but the doctor had checked you out!” Clark explained.

“Ohh man… My camera! Have you seen my camera?” Jimmy wondered.

“It’s right here, Jimmy! Don’t you worry about that right now! Just get well!” Lois said.

“Well, now that he’s awake, I guess I’ll head back to the office. It sounds like he’ll be okay!” Clark said to Lois. Clark then said goodbye and left the room while Lois stayed behind.

“I… Uhh… I need to get the pictures back to the Daily Planet for the paper tomorrow…” Jimmy said.

“Hey! You listen here, Jimmy! You were exposed to some sort of radiation! You’re going home and you’re going to stay home tomorrow and get a day’s worth of rest! Is that understood?” Lois said in a stern tone of voice.

“Oh Miss Lane! I feel fine!” Jimmy replied. “I can’t wait to get out of here!”

“Well, I’m taking you home as soon as the doctor says you’re okay!” she replied.

Just then the doctor arrived, carrying several papers and a few x-rays in his hand.

“Well, seems like Mr. Olsen here got zapped by some weird device! He’s been exposed to high levels of zeta and epsilon kappa radiation!”

“Uhh… What’s that mean, doctor?” Lois asked him.

“We don’t know! It’s an unusual combination and we’ve never had anyone experience any level of exposure to this type of radiation before! So, I will release Mr. Olsen, but as soon as he sees or feels anything funny or unusual, I want to report that to me right away!” the doctor instructed.

“I will, doctor! Other than that, I’m feeling fine!” Jimmy responded. “Honest! I want to go home!”

“All your vital signs are good. I don’t see anything wrong with him. You’re free to go!” the doctor said, as he handed Jimmy a plastic bag containing his clothes.

Jimmy hopped out of bed, removed his hospital gown, and put on his clothes. Then, Lois walked him over to the front desk, where he filled out some papers. From there, they went to the parking garage and got in the car, and Lois too him home.

Luckily for him, he only lived ten minutes from the hospital so he was home in no time at all. As soon as Lois had dropped him off, he changed clothes, he fed Alvin, his black cat, and he turned on his TV. He was starving and no wonder since he hadn’t eaten.


Jimmy put on a comfortable t-shirt and shorts, and he sat down on his couch. He basically got the day off, as well as the following day, on doctor’s orders. He got zapped with unknown quantities of a strange combination of radiation, and he could experience unexpected side-effects from it. But, truth be known, he really wasn’t worried since he was feeling great.

He ate a ham and cheese sandwich with a glass of milk. He ate everything, since he was so hungry. When he was done, he felt very tired, so he turned off the TV set and crawled in bed.

Several hours later, he woke up, feeling very constricted by his shirt. In fact, his t-shirt had gotten very tight around his chest and shoulders. It was as if his shirt had suddenly shrunk in the wash!

“Uhhh man… I thought this shirt was rather big on me? It’s killing me!” he groaned, as he turned on his back while lying on his bed.

Jimmy also noticed that his chest and arms felt a little heavier. That was strange! What was going on here? His shirt sleeves were killing him. He had to get this shirt off of him!

Jimmy raised up his arms and stretched them out when suddenly his sleeves tore! Both ends!

RRRRRRIIIPPPPPPP!!!

His biceps tore holes in both sleeves of his t-shirt!

Then he rolled around on his stomach and pushed down on his bed, using his hands, while flexing his pectorals. This strained his shirt even more, causing the front of the shirt to rip from the collar down the middle as well!

RRRRRRRIIIIIIPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!!

“Oh crap! I just tore my shirt to shreds!” he gasped.

Jimmy reached down and practically ripped the rest of the thin, cotton shirt off his back with his bare hands!

Then, he got off his bed and examined his reflection in the mirror. His pectorals had expanded a bit, his biceps were bigger, and his abdominal muscles had gained some definition. He now had lats under his arms and his quads were beginning to grow thicker and wider. He realized that he had started to gain some muscle overnight!

“What the heck? Where did that muscle come from?” he wondered out loud.

Was it pure coincidence? Or could it have anything to do with the accident in the plant? Jimmy was going to stay home the next day and see what happens…
1142.title: Jimmy’s muscles increase ten times faster...

choices: Shopping mall; luckily his clothes stayed in one piece this time!
Jimmy gets a call from Clark and Lois.
11421.content:
Jimmy went to bed that night wearing only a pair of shorts and his underwear. So, when he woke up the following morning, he was greeted by his handsome chest, bulging biceps and his thick arms when he examined his reflection in the mirror. He was as muscular as he was the previous night, but it seemed like he now had some additional veins which had popped up in his arms and legs as well.

“My goodness! How can I possibly become so muscular without even going to the gym and lifting any weights at all?” he wondered out loud.

Jimmy then walked over to the closet and rummaged around, realizing that he came across several clothes which probably didn’t fit him anymore.

“Dang! I need to go clothes shopping now!” he sighed. “I’ve outgrown some of my shirts and shorts already!”

He found a large pair of sweatshirts and sweatpants, which had always seemed big on him. So, he slipped into the gray sweatshirt and sweatpants, which were indeed a size too big, for now.

“Oh, I’m not gonna outgrow these anytime soon! So, I might wear these today while I stay home!” he chuckled.

Jimmy prepared a bowl of cereal as he turned on the TV and watched the local news, before changing the channel to some sports station, which was showing a football game. He watched that for a while until he got bored.

“Let’s get some fresh air outside!” he decided, as he put on thick athletic socks and his walking sneakers before he headed out the door. He walked around the block, saying hi to a few people who were walking around the neighborhood. Of course, nobody noticed anything unusual about Jimmy since he was wearing those big, oversized sweats. He just looked the way he always looked, but with sweatpants and a big sweatshirt.

He walked several blocks, not realizing offhand that his muscles were slowly growing bigger and bigger, slowly filling out his sweatshirt and his sweatpants.

After about an hour of walking around the neighborhood and saying hi to several of his neighbors, he began to notice that his sweatshirt started to feel a little tighter. Not just that, but his baggy sweatpants didn’t fit that loose anymore, either. In fact, his sweats started to get pretty tight after a while.

By the time Jimmy started walking back to his house, the sweatshirt fit very tight around his chest and abdominal muscles. It felt so tight; it began to hurt him in his chest and in his shoulders. His legs began to ache, especially around the quads and calves!

“Darn! What is up with these clothes? I thought they were too big on me! They’re killing me now!” he grumbled, as the sweatshirt was fitting very tight around his arms and his chest. The outlines of his pectorals began to show in the front, and the shapes and the curves of his biceps were beginning to form in the sleeves as well.

“Crap! These sweats couldn’t just shrink? I didn’t wash them! I’ve been wearing them for the past hour!” Jimmy complained as he started walking to his house at an accelerated speed. But the pain in his legs had become almost unbearable! He had to stop, even though he was only two blocks from his house.

“Nuts! I don’t want to walk the rest of the way in my underwear! My legs are killing me! What’s up with these sweatpants? They’re too small on me now!”

Then it happened! Due to all the walking around, his muscles in his legs had grown more than all his other muscles! So, his quads and his calves were at the point where they would practically explode out of his sweats!

Suddenly, two giant holes were blown out of the back of his sweatpants!

RRRIPPPPP!!!!!!!! CRACKKKKKKK!!!!!!

His massive calves had completely burst out of the back of his sweats! They had completely grown out of them, and exploded out of his sweatpants!

“Holy crap! I just tore holes in my—“

RRRRRRRRIIIIIIIPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!!!!!

Jimmy sweatshirt finally gave way to his growing chest and shoulders, ripping clearly down the middle from the shirt collar all the way down to the abdominals in one long vertical line! The big tear in the sweatshirt revealed his huge, bulging pectorals and his impressive washboard abdominals!

“I’d better get home!” Jimmy panicked as he sprinted home, but not without passing Mrs. Jones, one of his neighbors.

“Hey Jimmy!” she said to him, while watering the plants in her garden. “You’ve been working out, huh?”

“Uhhh…. I guess you could say that!” Jimmy replied shyly. He really didn’t know what else to say!

Once he got to the house, he got inside and closed the door, just as he tore the rest of the sweats off of him so he could throw them in the trash.

“Now I really need new clothes!” Jimmy groaned. “Big, new clothes!”

Jimmy looked for the biggest shirt and shorts he could find, put them on, and got in the car. Then he drove to the mall where he went shopping for some clothes, extra-large size!
11421.title: Jimmy's muscles continue to grow the next d...

choices: The examination at S.T.A.R. Labs
Jimmy keeps on growing more muscle at the lab
114212.content:
Jimmy woke up the following morning feeling heavier, bigger, and bulkier than the day before. Not to mention, he was feeling stronger! He stood up and groggily stumbled his way to the bathroom, almost ripping the doorknob off the door with his amazing strength. He walked in and stared at his reflection in the mirror, which confirmed what he feared: His muscles had expanded even more overnight!

His lats were astounding and his shoulders were amazingly wide, practically spanning four feet across! His pectorals were like big, solid spheres of hard-rock muscle, implanted in his chest and sticking out from his bulging chest like massive boulders of steel or armor. His biceps were beginning to look like beach balls now, and they were the size of footballs that were implanted in his arms, with a long, thick vein running over each muscle. As he backed off, he could just barely make out the thick, massive quads, that were now as thick and as wide as steel columns, and finally, those bulging calf muscles, which were now bigger than soccer balls, sticking out from the back of his legs below the knees.

“Holy mackerel! I’m beginning to turn into a muscle man!” Jimmy gasped.

The next issue was finding something… Anything to wear that would fit his growing, muscular body! Every shirt that he pulled out of his dresser was too small. What a pain! He pulled out one shirt after another, only to throw them into a pile on the floor.

“Oh man… I got nothing to wear!”

Finally, he found his bathrobe, which was hanging from the bathroom door. It was the only thing that still fit him, since it was only fastened by a cloth belt that he would fasten by tying a knot together.

Just then, the phone rang in the kitchen. Jimmy quickly walked over to answer it right away.

“Hello? Oh, hi Mr. Kent! What? Oh, I’m feeling much better! I should be into work tomorrow… I... Uhhh… I may need to buy some clothes first…. Why? Well… Let’s just say…. Uhmm… My muscles have grown a little bit…. I have no idea why…. I’ve been getting bigger and bigger… I swear! I look like Superman now! You’d be proud of me! You think I need to see a doctor? Well, I just got my bathrobe to wear right now… You think I need to go to S.T.A.R. labs? Really? Oh, well, sure… If you think so…. Sure, Mr. Kent! Bye!”

Jimmy brushed his teeth and combed his curly hair. Within seconds, there was suddenly a knock on the front door of his small apartment. When Jimmy opened up, he saw the Man of Steel standing before him!

“Holy smokes! Superman!”

“Hello there, Jimmy!” Superman said to him. “I heard that you’ve been experiencing some of the side effects of the radiation from the other day?”

“Uhh… Yeah…”

“Can you show me?”

“Sure… Look!” Jimmy said as he removed his bathrobe, revealing his incredibly muscled body. In fact, Jimmy began to appear to have slightly larger muscles than Superman at this point!

“Great Moons of Krypton!” Superman exclaimed. “How did you become so muscular?”

“I… I have no idea, Superman! My muscles just started to grow and grow and grow!” Jimmy explained.

“Well, I think we should have someone take a look at you! Let me fly you over to the lab, just to be on the safe side, okay?” Superman suggested to him.

“Sure, Superman! I appreciate it!”

The twosome then stepped outside, where Superman carefully lifted Jimmy’s body up and held him with one arm under his knees and the other under his shoulders. Then, Superman lifted off, flying northbound, towards S.T.A.R. labs, where Dr. Hamilton could check him out and see if he was in any kind of mortal danger or not….
114212.title: Jimmy gets a call from Clark and Lois.

choices: Jimmy becomes a 8 foot muscle giant
Jimmy's growth finally slows... for now.
1142122.content:
Dr. Hamilton entered the small examination room where Superman and Jimmy were seated on two chairs. Superman was just wearing his usual uniform while Jimmy was wearing his long, white bathrobe, covering his entire body.

“Greetings, gentlemen! What can I do for you?” the doctor asked.

“Doctor, Jimmy has been exposed to radiation at the chemical plant several days ago. Even though the radiation doesn’t appear to be life-threatening, there have been some visible side-effects to this exposure. We just wanted you to look at him.” Superman explained.

“Uhmm… Sure! Let’s have a look!”

Jimmy stood up and removed the bathrobe, revealing his incredibly muscular body! His pecs were truly enormous! They were sticking out like two giant globes of steel! His abs were stunningly defined as well. His quads were very thick and wide and his calves were the biggest calf muscles the doctor had ever seen! Jimmy couldn’t walk anymore without the bulging quads and calves rubbing up against each other, due to their width. Not only that, but Jimmy also seemed a little taller than before! It appeared that he may have grown a few more inches over the past day or so!

“Wow! Talk about a bodybuilder!” the doctor exclaimed.

“That’s just the thing, doctor! Five days ago, Mr. Olsen was thin! He was only 150 pounds and 5 foot 4 inches tall!” Superman explained.

“And… My muscles are still growing!” Jimmy said quietly. “I wake up feeling bigger and heavier every morning!”

“Okay! We’ll take all the measurements. I’ll need some blood samples, and I’ll take some x-rays. Then I need you to stay overnight so I can do it again tomorrow morning and once more in the afternoon!” the doctor instructed.

Dr. Hamilton led Jimmy into a hospital room where he was hooked up to an IV. They took his blood and they ran some tests. Then he had some dinner before he fell asleep. The following morning, he woke up and the nurse checked his weight and vital signs again.

That afternoon, Jimmy went to a small gym in the hospital where he checked his strength. He bench-pressed over 700 pounds and he was able to lift more weight than he had ever lifted in his entire life! He felt stronger than ever!

When the doctor came, his height and weight was measured again, before he got his lunch. Superman also returned to check up on his friend. When Jimmy got out of bed, Superman noticed that Jimmy was about as tall as him, standing 6 foot 3 inches tall!

“Jimmy has grown another 3 inches in height…” Dr. Hamilton noted. “Not only that, but he has gained about thirty pounds in muscle overnight at the same time!”

“Is he gonna keep on growing like that?” Superman asked him.

“Let me keep him here for a few more days so we can run some tests on him. That’s the only way we can find out!” the doctor replied.

Jimmy just watched TV and played games on the computer. He also went swimming in the pool and he lifted weights in the gym for an hour. When he returned to his room, he felt as if his body had continued to grow again!

The third day was no different! When Superman arrived to visit him, Jimmy got out of bed and was shocked when he noticed that he was now towering over the man of Steel! He was at least 6 foot 6 inches tall, making him 3 inches taller than Superman!

“Wow, Superman! I’m taller than you!” Jimmy grinned.

Superman couldn’t believe it! He was now looking up to Jimmy Olsen! Not only was Jimmy taller than him, but his muscles also seemed far bigger than his own!

“You’re becoming quite a large man for your age, Jimmy!”

“Yeah… Uhh… I guess so, Superman!”

Jimmy just chuckled. He would never have imagined that one day he would be bigger and more muscular than Superman!

Dr. Hamilton came to draw blood once again and to check his vital signs. Then he sat down in the hospital room where Jimmy stayed.

“Okay… Jimmy’s muscle growth was indeed triggered by the radiation exposure. The good news is that we think that the growth is slowing down very gradually. The bad news is… It may take a few more days before the growth stops! So, Jimmy will still grow another foot taller before his muscles quit growing!”

“Wow!” Jimmy cheered.

“And then? Will that be the end of it?” Superman wondered.

“We don’t know. He will stop growing any bigger for now. But that is no guarantee something else might trigger a growth spurt in him! Like, some food or medicine could cause him to have little growth spurts! But we don’t know about them until it happens!”

Superman took a deep sigh. The only thing he could look forward to now, is Jimmy Olsen becoming a huge muscle giant of a man…
1142122.title: Jimmy keeps on growing more muscle at the lab

choices: Jimmy becomes a new superhero
Jimmy becomes the largest reporter in town
11421221.content:
Jimmy spent another three days at S.T.A.R. Labs where he grew another 8 inches, 6 inches, and finally 4 inches taller respectively, until it seemed as if his growth had finally stopped on the fourth and final day. But, when Jimmy got out of bed on the fourth day and greeted Dr. Hamilton, the doctor was greeted by a huge, eight-foot tall muscle giant of a man with curly red hair and giant muscles, weighing over 500 pounds!

“Well, Mr. Olsen, there really isn’t much of anything else I can do for you here!” the doctor said, grinning slightly as Jimmy had to duck in order to get under the door frames.

“Gosh, I need to get used to ducking or bending down in order to get through buildings! These doors aren’t made for people who are eight feet tall!” Jimmy grinned.

“No, they’re not!” the doctor laughed. “Well, shall I call a cab for you so you can get home?”

“No! I won’t fit in an ordinary car! You need to call my work at the Daily Planet and see if you can get a hold of Mr. Kent! Ask him to get a hold of Superman!” Jimmy instructed the doctor.

The doctor dialed the newspaper’s office and got a hold of Clark Kent, telling him that Jimmy was ready to be picked up by someone since he was ready to be released from the hospital.

Within minutes, the Man of Steel himself landed before the main entrance of the lab and walked in the main entrance, asking for Jimmy and Dr. Hamilton.

“Hi Superman!” Jimmy said as he smiled and waved his huge hand. Of course, Superman was looking straight at Jimmy’s abdominal muscles. He had to crane his neck in order to see Jimmy’s face.

“Holy smoke! You’re really, REALLY BIG!” Superman exclaimed.

“Could you fly me home? Please?” Jimmy asked politely.

Superman had to struggle a bit to get a grasp on Jimmy’s big, hulking body, since he was so large! He wrapped his one arm around Jimmy’s back legs, as far as he could, and the other arm rested against Jimmy’s big, broad shoulders. Jimmy was almost too big for Superman to carry, but he just barely was able to lift him, carefully carrying him through the air and flying him to the rooftop of the Daily Planet building.

Yet, when Superman had set Jimmy down on the roof, he couldn’t help but stare in awe at his best friend and colleague. The shy reporter and photographer had truly transformed into a big, hulking muscle giant, who was now towering over him! He was now looking down on everybody, even Superman, by more than a foot-and-a-half! Superman was staring straight at Jimmy’s massive wall of abdominals, since the young man was so gigantic.

Jimmy stepped closer and asked Superman something he always wanted to try.

“Superman… May I… lift you up? I’m just dying to do that!” he asked his best friend.

“Oh… Sure, Jimmy!”

Jimmy slowly approached his hero and gently placed his huge hands under Superman’s arms. Then, he slowly lifted up his big hero, raising him until the man of Steel was at his eye-level. As Superman looked down, he realized that his legs were dangling almost two feet above the ground!

“Wow! This is so exciting! I’m holding Superman in my hands! This is amazing! You’re not even heavy at all!” Jimmy exclaimed. “Plus, you’re so small!”

“Well…” Superman chuckled. “Everybody’s small compared to you, Jimmy!”

“I guess I can use my size and strength to help you!” Jimmy suddenly suggested. “What do you think? After all, now I got super strength!”

“Hmmm… Perhaps! We could get you a big outfit to wear!” Superman suggested. “Take a day to think it over, okay?”

“Okay! Thanks, Superman!”

Then Jimmy went inside of the building where he went straight into his office. Of course, everybody was amazed by his height and his huge muscles!

Meanwhile, Superman flew around and changed into his normal clothes, so Clark Kent could greet him.

A large crowd formed around the giant young man as he walked around the hallway. Everybody came to greet the big, 8-foot man with giant muscles!

Jimmy was enjoying his new popularity as a muscle giant! But, could he also become a new superhero?
11421221.title: Jimmy becomes a 8 foot muscle giant

choices: Batman (Bruce Wayne)
Blue Beetle (Jaime Reyes)
Guy Gardner
12.content: Alright then... Pick a character.
12.title: Batman: Brave and The Bold (TV Series)

choices: Superman
Lightning Lad
Brainiac 5 (Human form) (I was skeptical about this)
Chameleon Boy (Without the use of his powers)
13.title: The Legion of Superheroes (TV Series)

choices: Robin
Bart Allen
Superboy
14.title: Teen Titans

choices: Robin wakes up the next day and has a small muscle growth spurt!
First, nothing happens... Then Robin has a huge muscle growth spurt!
141.content:
The Bat mobile was speeding down the main road which led to the research lab at the university. An alarm had gone off in the middle of the night, and several police officers were dispatched to the lab following a report of a mugging. A young woman had her purse snatched while walking down the street. Minutes later, a student got robbed at gunpoint. Obviously, a criminal was on the loose.

Two officers were walking around the lab looking for the suspect, using flashlights as the scoured the outside of the lab. But the police Commissioner wanted extra help, so he turned on the famous bat-signal. Batman called him on the bat-phone, and the Commissioner explained what the situation was. Within minutes, the Bat mobile was speeding towards the lab at the university.

The Dynamic Duo leaped from the Bat mobile and started wandering around the area surrounded the lab where the woman got mugged. Batman spotted a small cosmetics box and a brush on the ground, clues which indicated that things had fallen from a female’s purse during a struggle. As they walked further, they spotted an open door, leading into the lab.

“The robber went into the lab! You go to the left, Robin!” Batman instructed. “And I’ll look to the right!”

Robin carefully wandered around, walking among several machines, chemical beakers, large computers, and other scientific equipment until he suddenly heard a sound like a coin dropping to the floor.

“Hey! You! Over there!” Robin shouted out so a man wearing a black shirt and gray shorts.

The man started running away with Robin in pursuit. He threw empty canisters and glass beakers to the floor in his attempt to slow Robin down, but Robin was able to leap over the obstacles. When Robin had almost caught up to the man, he made a mighty leap into the air and jumped on top of the man's shoulders!

The man was slightly taller than Robin, and he bent over forward and he threw Robin on to the floor.

He ran a few yards until he came to a large metal drum containing a green, thick liquid. The drum was ten feet wide and six feet deep. The man had no other place to go, as Robin was about to jump on top of him again.

This time, the man lifted Robin’s body over his head, and raised him up all the way using his arms.

“Batman! I got him! OVER HERE!” Robin shouted.

But before Robin could do anything else, the man hurled Robin into the large drum, which contained the strange, green chemical.

With a loud plunge, Robin sank into the green liquid. He was completely underwater, until he finally came to the surface.

The man saw that there was a switch on the outside of the drum, which sent electricity into the toxic water. He flipped the switch, sending electrical charges flying across the green liquid and Robin’s body!

“Batman! HELP!” Robin screamed as he felt the toxic chemicals go through his body!

The man was about to run away when a batarang flew through the air! It circled around him, wrapping his arms and legs in strong, metal cords. Finally, Batman ran up to the drum and shut off the power to the pool of green liquid. Unfortunately, Robin was already underwater for the second time. Batman fired a batarang which hooked on to Robin’s body, allowing Batman to pull his sidekick out of the green, murky water as quickly as possible.

Batman hoisted Robin’s body over his shoulder before he carried him to the bat mobile. From there, he took the Boy Wonder to the Bat cave as quickly as possible…
141.title: Robin

choices: Robin has a growth spurt during the bank robbery
Robin grows after he comes home from the bank robbery
1411.content:
When Robin woke up, he was lying in a metal bed, connected with wires to the Medcom in the Batcave. The Medcom was the medical computer, which was programmed to analyze any type of medical condition that Batman or Robin might have.

“Ohhh Batman… I feel awful! I got a splitting headache! And that green gooey stuff that I fell into! That stuff smelled awful! Then I got zapped with electricity! Urrgg!” Robin groaned.

Batman leaned over as he read the text on the computer screen, following a careful diagnosis of Robin’s body following his plunge into the drum at the research lab.

“Your body has absorbed some sort of toxic chemical. The computer analyzed it as a plant growth stimulant. Furthermore, the electrical charges combined with the toxic chemical have altered your DNA somehow…” Batman remarked as he read the results on the screen.

“Uhh… What does that mean? I’m turning into a plant? Or am I going to grow seeds?” Robin chuckled.

“I’m not sure! But… Let’s just keep an eye on you, okay? Why don’t you get cleaned up! Go enjoy a nice, long, hot bath and then crawl in bed!” Batman suggested.

“Roger that, Batman!”

The Boy Wonder then jumped off the table and then ran into the locker room at the end of the batcave where he quickly removed his colorful costume and yellow cape. He tossed his dirty costume in a laundry bin, next to a closet with a dozen other Robin-costumes which he had, ready to be worn at a moment’s notice. From there, he ran upstairs into the house through a secret, trap door under the stairwell, which only he and Batman knew about.

Once he was upstairs, he emerged as the former acrobat and student of criminology and martial arts, Dick Grayson went into his bathroom and filled his tub with warm water. He got in and sat in his tub for thirty minutes, enjoying the peace and quiet while allowing the sticky, dirty, green goo to get off his skin. About thirty minutes later, he got up and used soap and a wash cloth to clean himself and to rinse his body thoroughly. Dick came out of the top and dried off. He put on a short and t-shirt before he quietly went to sleep.

Dick slept like a log all through the night, unaware that the strange toxic chemicals were at work deep inside of his body. He was completely unaware that he was about to experience the first effects of his exposure to this weird combination of toxic chemicals mixed with electricity, which were sent through his body as he was immersed in a drum filled with this stuff!

When the first sparks of light came shining through the curtains in his bedroom, Dick groggily turned around on his bed and stared at the small, digital clock on his dresser. He was usually the first person awake, since he was so used to getting up early in order to go to school in the morning. Luckily for him, this was a Sunday morning, and he really didn’t have to wake up early for any reason other than the fact that he wanted to get up to go for a walk outside. He turned on the light in his room and then he looked around his dresser for some shorts and a thin cotton t-shirt to wear so he could put on something comfortable to wear outside.

He finally put on his running shoes before he walked to the front door, carefully unlocking the door and slipping outside. He then started on his light jog around the neighborhood, so he could enjoy the sights and sounds of the birds and the dogs barking and a few of his neighbors also walking around and greeting one another.

After he had completed a short run around the block, he got back into Wayne Manor, he closed and locked the front door behind him and he went into the kitchen to get a glass of cold water to drink.

Bruce Wayne had just got up and he was sitting in the living room, reading the newspaper while Dick Grayson was standing in the kitchen pouring him a glass of water, when Dick was suddenly overcome by an odd, tingling sensation. It struck him very sudden, causing him to close his eyes and tilt his head backwards for a brief moment while he let out a soft groan.

Dick’s calf muscles on the back of his legs suddenly began to swell, like his muscles were growing! They inflated rapidly like helium balloons, gaining more muscle and definition with every passing second! They pushed outward and sideways, growing from thin muscles into thick, hard and round spheres of muscle, bulging out from the back of his legs, until they were as big as softballs… All within a matter of seconds!

Next, his quadriceps, those thick muscles on his legs, just above the knees, started to expand and thicken at the same time. They hardened and grew wider for a few seconds, like they had been used in a grueling workout! Dick had no idea what was happening to him, as his legs grew thicker and more muscular over a period of ten seconds!

Finally, the growth spurt stopped, and Dick lowered his head again, panting and sweating for a moment, feeling as if he had just experienced an intense workout. What had just happened to him?

He casually walked into the living room, where Bruce was sitting in his chair, reading the newspaper. When Bruce looked up, he noticed something different about his companion.

“Good morning!”

“Hey, good morning, Bruce!”

“Did you go for your usual run around the block?”

“Yeah! I went around the block twice already!” Dick responded.

“I see… I can tell. You’re all sweaty! You must have had a good workout!”

Dick just shrugged. He smiled in return.

“Have you been working out your legs?”

“My legs?”

“Your legs! You look like you’ve gained some muscle! Or, am I seeing things?” Bruce remarked.

“Are you sure?” Dick wondered.

“They seem a little bigger!” Bruce said. “Let’s go check you out!”

Bruce and Dick went downstairs into the batcave where Bruce had the Medcom do another quick scan of Dick.

“You just gained six pounds! Overnight!” Bruce noted. “Six pounds… of muscle!”

“What? But… all I did was run around the block! That’s crazy!” Dick replied.

“Let’s see if you grow some more!” Bruce said.

Just then the alarm went off. The bat signal! The notice flashed on the computer! There was a bank robbery in Gotham City!

“Showtime!” Bruce said, as the two men quickly changed into Batman and Robin, before they leaped into the Bat mobile and raced off to the bank in order to stop a robbery from happening…
1411.title: Robin wakes up the next day and has a small mus...

choices: The two go and stop an attack caused by Bane's Venom enhanced thugs.
Robin grows during an appearance at a kids' show.
14112.content:
Four masked men entered the bank at the same time, waving guns at the tellers while holding plastic bags in their hands. They quickly ran up to the tellers and asked them to open their registers and to empty all their cash in the plastic bags, while the other robbers had ordered all the customers and tellers to lay on the floor with their hands behind their heads.

“C’mon! Hurry it up! We ain’t got all day!” one robber sneered at the tellers, who were very nervous.

Unknown to the robbers, one of the tellers had stepped on a secret tile on the floor, which had triggered a silent alarm, which went off in the police station. From there, the Commissioner had activated the bat signal.

“C’mon! Gimme the bags…. Let’s go-go-go!” the impatient robber shouted at the tellers as he snatched the bags, filled with money, out of the hands of the trembling bank employees’ hands.

“What a shame! We just wanted to make a deposit!”

The robbers turned around and were greeted by two caped men, standing in the middle of the bank lobby. Batman and Robin!

The first robber was about to shoot his gun, when it was snatched out of his hand by a batarang! When he bent down to pick up his weapon, he was greeted by a strong first in his jaw!

BAM!

Meanwhile, Robin swung a rope from his utility belt to the beam below the ceiling, and then he leaped into the air, swinging three feet above the ground as he headed towards two other robbers, kicking them in their stomachs!

BOOOOFFF!!!!

As soon as he landed on his feet, Robin engaged in a fistfight with both of them!

BOOM! BAM! BOMM!! BIFF!!!

Batman knocked out the first robber before he used a special spray to render the second one unconscious. Then he swung the batarang at the third robber, who was fighting Robin, allowing the batarang to encircle the robber until the thug was completely tied up with a steel cable, and unable to move his arms!

Robin threw three more punches using all his strength to knock out the last robber, when he finally decided to use his stronger legs, leaping in the air and kicking the man in his head. This sent the men tumbling to the ground, knocked out!

“There! Those new leg-muscles help a lot!” Robin grinned, looking down at his inflated legs.

Suddenly, the Dynamic Duo heard police sirens approaching from a distance. They dashed out the front door, leaped into the Bat-mobile, and raced off to the bat cave.

Moments later, Batman and Robin returned to their hideout, where they discussed the events which took place in the bank.

“You had some impressive strength-moves in the bank just now, Robin!” Batman said to his apprentice. “I had never seen you leap so high in the air before!”

“Well… I could feel the strength in my legs! I guess that was the result of that weird growth spurt I had earlier?” Robin wondered.

“Yes! But, I wonder if you’ll have more of them…” Batman thought.

“Well, I have no idea when it… Uhh…” Robin replied, when he closed his eyes and cringed.

“Hey! Robin! What’s the matter?” Batman remarked as he rushed towards his sidekick. He realized that there was something wrong with him.

Robin tilted his head back. Then he made fists, tensing his muscles in his arms. He took a deep breath before letting out a soft growl, when suddenly Batman could hear a bone-cracking noise coming from within Robin’s body.

KKKKKKKKRRRRRRRRRRRRRR!!!!!!!

Robin’s chest suddenly pushed outward! His pectorals practically ballooned right before Batman’s eyes! The Caped Crusader just stared on, completely slack-jawed in amazement, as he watched Robin’s bright red uniform get tighter and tighter, to the point where the yellow strings on the front of the shirt of his uniform started to rip apart as Robin’s bulging chest muscles started to push apart his shirt! Not only that, but Robin’s arms were bulging as well. Specifically, his biceps and his triceps were inflating and expanding, to the point where they were tearing apart the sleeves of his green shirt!

CRACKKKK! RRIPPPP!

Robin’s mighty, bulging pectorals had pushed out from his chest by at least eight inches, leaving a deep cleavage between the two halves of his chest! His biceps were as round as melons! It was amazing!

“Uhhhh! Batman! What… What just happened to me?” Robin gasped, like he had just come out of a daze.

“You just had another growth spurt, my friend! You need a bigger costume!” Batman smiled.

Robin quickly removed his torn shirt, before examining his body in the mirror.

“Holy Hercules, Batman! I’m all big and buff now!”

Robin stood in the bathroom, examining his big, bulging chest and his large, round biceps. Boy, was he STRONG! He could feel the strength!

“We’ll use the computer to create a new costume for you! That will fit you, until your next growth spurt… Whenever that comes!” Batman suggested.

Unfortunately for Batman, Robin’s next growth spurt was just around the corner!

What happens next?
14112.title: Robin grows after he comes home from the bank r...

choices: The Dynamic Duo fights the Joker at a museum heist
The Dynamic Duo fights the Penguin at an art show heist
141122.content:
“Well, I guess I can relax in the hot tub for now…” Dick said, as he removed his clothes and climbed in the hot tub. He was in the tub for barely ten minutes, when Bruce knocked on the bathroom door.

“Hey! Remember your appointment at the youth club, right?” Bruce said, as he just opened the door enough so Dick could hear him.

“The youth club?”

“Yes! Robin’s supposed to show up there at five to meet a group of kids and to talk about fighting crime!” Bruce Wayne reminded the teen.

“Oh my gosh! I almost forgot about that!” Dick replied. “I’m gonna need a bigger costume for that!”

“I’ll make you a bigger vest and shirt! Don’t worry! I don’t think you’ll outgrow this one right away!” Bruce assured him.

Then Bruce went down to the Batcave where he instructed the computer to create a new costume for Robin, but one size larger, in order to cover Dick’s increased muscular body.

A few minutes later, Dick came down to the Batcave, wearing just his bathrobe.

“Okay, now put this on and see how it fits!” Bruce instructed the muscular boy.

The green shirt was comfortable but tight. The red vest fit nice and snug, but the yellow laces tied it up, making the red vest fit nice and tight around Dick’s torso and his big, bulging chest. The sleeves of the green shirt were much bigger, showing his much bigger biceps as well.

“I hope I’m not gonna outgrow this costume today! At the rate I’m growing these days…” Dick mumbled, as he placed the black mask over his face, completing his Robin costume, except for the yellow utility belt and the green shoes. “You may need to create an even bigger costume for me by tonight!”

“We’ll see what happens! Your increased strength and size might come in handy some day!” Bruce remarked.

Then Robin got on his motorcycle and started the engine. A secret door opened, and the Boy Wonder rode off and headed towards the youth center, where he arrived ten minutes later.

All the kids gawked and glanced at the much larger Boy Wonder, who certainly looked bigger, taller, and definitely more muscular than they had remembered seeing him on TV or even on the colorful poster of Batman and Robin, which was hanging on the wall in front of the classroom.

“Classroom… This is Robin! He’s here to talk about safety and how to be safe everywhere you go! Give him a big round of applause!” Mrs. Wilson said, as the kids in the room stood up and applauded as Robin came forward to the front of the small classroom.

“Hello everyone! My name is Robin and I’m here to talk about child safety!” Robin began, leading in to his 10-minute speech about being safe and secure. He talked about being vigilant, not talking to strangers, never walking outside all alone, and locking all doors and windows of the house at night or when home alone. He also talked about what to do when there was a fire, or if a child was in a car accident with an adult, and how to call 9-1-1 and what to say in case of an emergency. Finally, in the end, Robin allowed time for questions where kids could come up to him and greet him or shake his hand or even get his autograph.

A curious boy, about ten years old, stood up with a big smile on his face. He walked up to Robin and shook his hand.

“Wow! How did your muscles get so big? You don’t look that big on the posters!” the boy said.

“Oh! Umm…. Well… I just recently grew bigger…” Robin stuttered a bit, not knowing how to explain his amazing growth spurts.

Another girl raised her hand and stood up.

“Can I feel your big muscles?”

This made Robin blush a bit. He loved being with the kids and there was no reason to say no.

“Umm… Sure…” Robin shrugged. “I don’t see why not!”

The girl asked Robin to squat down, which he did. She then felt his biceps with her hand, by placing her thin, small fingers over his big, bulging muscles.

“Wow! Your muscles are so big and hard!” she said.

Robin then stood up straight, only allowing her to reach his legs now. The boy and the girl then walked around the mighty hero, admiring the huge, muscle-bound youth.

“I wanna feel his leg-muscles!” the boy said to the girl.

The girl got behind Robin and gently started rubbing Robin’s calf muscle on his left leg, while the boy started rubbing his calf muscle on his right leg.

Robin was too busy to answer question from other kids to say anything, although he did feel the kids’ hands rubbing up against his calves, when he was suddenly overcome by the weird, tingling sensation which had struck him every time he had a growth spurt!

“Ohh man…. Not again!” Robin groaned, as he let out a soft moan.

“Hey!” the little girl, who was rubbing Robin’s leg said. “I think his legs are growing!”

“Wow! We made his muscles grow even bigger!” the little boy exclaimed.

The two kids, along with all the other kids in the room, let out a collective gasp when they saw their hero experience a tremendous muscle growth spurt, in their classroom, right before their eyes!

Not only did Robin’s muscles grow bigger, but Robin grew about four inches taller as well! His legs stretched out, growing longer in the process! His arms followed suit and his torso a little bit as well. His calf muscles then expanded by another three inches, becoming bigger, harder and firmer, right before the eyes of the two little kids.

Robin’s big chest expanded even more, now filling out his larger costume to the point where that was very tight! His pectorals bulged sideways and forward, while his biceps and triceps filled out a few inches more. Mighty delts and lats completed the broad shoulders on the bigger boy, followed by massive abdominal muscles and shocking quads on his legs which sported thick layers of muscle, covered by long, rope-like veins.

Robin was now becoming more of a teenage bodybuilder, as the kids looked on with delight and glee, enjoying the transformation before their very eyes!

“That was sooooo cool!”

“Wow! Did you see THAT?”

“Whoa! Robin just hulked out!”

“Robin just grew even bigger…. Just for us!”

“I wanna see him do that again!”

“Hey! Make him grow again!”

Robin was just able to catch his breath, realizing that he had just experienced another growth spurt! He felt bigger, taller, heavier and a LOT stronger! He noticed that he had become taller, his center of gravity had changed, and his costume was killing him!

“Umm… What happened? Holy muscles!” he exclaimed, when the teacher came before him and the kids.

“Okay class! Let’s all thank Mr. Robin for coming!” Mrs. Wilson said, as all the kids applauded.

As Robin walked out and headed to the parking lot, he couldn’t help but wonder what the kids must have been thinking, seeing him grow!

He hopped on the motorcycle and quickly raced back to the batcave, where he figured he would have an interesting story to tell Bruce. Not just that, but while he was riding, he couldn’t help but wonder. Was the growth spurt just pure coincidence, or was it perhaps triggered by something the kids had done to him?
141122.title: Robin grows during an appearance at a kids'...

choices: Robin has another growth spurt at the Penguin's hideout...
1411222.content:
The word got out on the street about the strange but peculiar method of causing Robin’s muscles to grow bigger and by causing the Boy Wonder’s body to grow taller… all at the same time! The fascinated children who were witnesses to the strange growth spurt of their unsuspecting hero told all their friends and relatives and neighbors about the strange growth spurt… Just by rubbing Robin’s calf muscles!

The news anchors of the nightly news show even started discussing the weird rumor that had been making the rounds, having one of the kids over during a live interview. Was it true? Rubbing Robin’s legs caused him to grow several inches taller, and made his muscles grow bigger? How was that even possible? But there were just too many kids around who were telling the same story to their parents and friends for this to be discounted as a coincidence. Unfortunately, several criminals had heard the news as well and had wondered if this rumor was true or not.

But at this point in time, they had no time to think about making Robin grow. They were going to drive two vans to the location of an art show in order to steal a large collection of valuable artwork!

The art exhibit had already closed and the visitors had left the building. One security guard had stayed behind to guard the building on the inside and on the outside; taking turns walking around the building while the place was closed and locked for the night. As the night time ticked away, the two vans pulled up in the back parking lot of the art gallery and they parked next to each other. Then the four men got out wearing ski masks and they made their way to the back entrance of the building. They used a stolen key to unlock the door, which had set off a silent alarm.

The men then got in and used flashlights to guide them as they wandered the dark hallways until they reached the small exhibition hall. From there, they quickly took turns and removed the paintings from the walls and placed them in large leather bags, which they were carrying with them. Once the paintings were all collected and stored inside of the large leather bags, they quietly walked out of the building and headed towards the parked vans.

One of the robbers there ran into the security guard, who sounded the alarm as he realized that the art exhibition hall was in the process of being robbed! The masked robber then removed a spray can from his pocket and sprayed a sleeping spray on the guard, knocking him unconscious almost instantly. The guard then fell to the floor as the robbers quickly loaded the painting into the back of the vans before they started the vans and began to drive off.

No sooner had the vans left the art exhibit building or the robbers realized that they were being followed! One van was being chased by nothing other than the famous Batmobile while the other van was being chased by a motorcycle containing a slightly taller and more muscular version of Robin, the Boy Wonder!

While Batman continued his chase and kept up on the first van, Robin was struggling to keep up with the van since he was on a motorcycle which wasn’t able to go as fast as the van. So, he realized that he had to do something to get up to speed with the runaway van very soon or else he would lose them!

Robin finally decided to unclip a batarang from his utility belt and to toss it at the ladder which was attached to the back metal door of the runaway van, which was driving at high speed in front of him. The batarang quickly latched on to the edge of the ladder, and when Robin felt confident that the batarang wouldn’t come loose, he increased the speed on his bike until he was going at maximum speed, to the point where he leaped from the seat of his motorcycle and soared through the air until he landed with his hands against the steps of the ladder. From there, he climbed up to the top of the van, where he held onto the metal roof while the van was still being driven.

When the drivers of the van realized that the Boy Wonder was no longer following them, he decided to slow down, not realizing that the enemy was actually riding on top of his van! The driver then drove to the secret hideout where the other van was to meet, none of them knowing that Batman was following the second van from a distance in order to not be detected.

Both vans drove into a large, indoor garage, where a large sliding door closed shut. The men then opened the back doors to the vans and began to unload the stolen artwork from the vans, when suddenly a short, fat man came walking into the garage. The man wore a black top hat with a black vest and nice black dress shoes and a bow tie with a cigar in his mouth. It was the Penguin!

“Okay you bungling birdbrains! You got all the paintings?” Penguin sneered at the four masked men. “These will earn me a pretty penny on the black market! Hahahaha!”

This statement greatly angered Robin who was listening in while he was still lying flat down on the roof of the van. He couldn’t hold it in any longer and decided to get up and leap down from the roof of the van, right before the Penguin and the four thugs!

“You won’t be getting ANY money for those paintings, Penguin! Those paintings were stolen and you know it! Those paintings will be returned to the art gallery and you guys will be tossed in jail!” Robin shouted at the five of them!

“Oh yeah?” Penguin shouted at the Boy Wonder. “You’re here all alone, and we’re here with the five of us! We can still beat you, even though you look bigger than you were before! Let’s get him, boys!”

Robin was able to put up a remarkable fight considering that he was all by himself and fighting against five people, all by himself. Thanks to his increased size, standing about six feet tall, and his increased muscles, he was able to knock out the first thug with just two punches. Then, he used his legs and a few karate moves to knock out the second guy. Then, he spun around, and used his legs to kick both of the remaining two guys at the same time. He started punching both guys, one by one, when the Penguin suddenly walked up to Robin and sprayed Robin in the face with a spray which rendered him unconscious. The Boy Wonder quickly tumbled to the ground, leaving the four wounded thugs licking their wounds for a moment.

“Darn that kid hurt us!” one of the masked thugs was complaining as he put bandages on his lips.

“Will you four fools take care of Robin before he wakes up? Wrap him up in a rope or something before he wakes up and beats all four of you guys! Idiots! Why does it take little old me to bring him down when he was about to punch out all four of you? Morons!” the Penguin growled as he turned around and marched back into the house.

The four guys found a thin rope and tied it around Robin’s arms and legs, as they laid him down on the floor. A few minutes later, the boy woke up again. The men helped the boy get on his feet, so he was standing in the corner. Then, they tied him up so he was tied with his back against a metal pole.

“You jerks won’t get away with this! The police will come looking for me and those paintings! Then you’ll all be tossed in jail for a very long time!” Robin shouted at them.

One of the guys, named Jerry, then turned and walked towards the Boy Wonder.

“You better hush there, boy. You talk tough but you’re not that big and tough!” the bigger man said to Robin.

“I wouldn’t be so sure!” another man named Karl said to him. “I heard something on the news that it was really easy to make him grow bigger and stronger!”

“Oh, come on!” Jerry laughed. “Someone only grows stronger by spending years in the gym, lifting weights and doing exercises! It takes hours and hours of long and hard work!”

“Well, this rumor is going around” Karl explained, “That just by rubbing Robin’s calves; he will grow bigger and more muscular!”

“Listen! That’s just a rumor and I don’t believe it!” Jerry replied.

“Is that true?” Karl asked Robin.

“Oh yeah!” Robin shrugged.

“Ohh come on! Nobody grows that easily! I’ll prove it!” Jerry growled as he got up from his chair and walked over to Robin was standing as he was tied to the metal pole by a rope. The man then walked to the back of Robin’s body and there he squatted down. He reached over with both arms and he began running his fingers over Robin’s calves, just below his knees on the back of his legs.

“Wow! You’re pretty muscular, kid! You must work out a lot! So how did you get so big?” Jerry asked Robin, as he continued to rub his calf muscles.
1411222.title: The Dynamic Duo fights the Penguin at an art sh...

choices: Robin grows into a 12-foot muscle giant
Robin grows into a 18-foot muscle giant
14112221.content:
But Robin just moaned in reply as he craned his head upwards and closed his eyes as tightly as possible while he tensed every muscle in his body. Then, there followed a bone-cracking noise which came from deep inside of Robin’s body.

KKKKKKKKKKKKKRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR

In the meantime, Batman had reached the Penguin’s hideout and he was watching when was going on from the outside using a special hidden camera. He was using a small metal cutter to cut his way into the garage and then to hide out in there to wait for the best time to rescue Robin and to get the paintings back.

“Look! The boy! His muscles are beginning to swell or something!” the thugs remarked.

Jerry and Karl got up and stepped back from Robin so they could see what was happening to the Boy Wonder.

Robin’s chest began to inflate like amazing balloons! His pecs grew like huge muscles, filling out his red and green shirt until his uniform began to rip in half! Then, his sleeves tore in half, due to the amazing muscle in his arms! His shoulders expanded in every direction, growing sideways and in the width, with veins covering every layer of muscle which was fighting to grow out from his expanding body!

His massive calves were ballooning out from his amazing legs and growing like huge footballs implanted in his legs. They just inflated and swelled like there was no end, becoming harder and bigger like anything ever seen! His quadriceps just grew thicker and wider and deeper at the same time, with multiple layers of veins coming to the surface as well, covering the mighty muscles all over the place, from his knees all the way up to his groin! His legs were becoming thicker than sewer pipes, exploding with powerful muscles which were making his legs look like rockets!

Not only were Robin’s muscles getting bigger, but he was growing taller as well! All these muscles were causing the boy to grow by another foot, rising up and expanding to almost a staggering height of 7 feet!

In fact, Robin was becoming so big, that his growing and expanding body was pressing up against the rope that was trying to contain him. However, the growing muscles were fighting a winning battle, and Robin’s expanding muscles finally won the fight! The rope snapped and fell to the floor, freeing the Boy Wonder as he was still growing bigger and more muscular!

Batman was hiding in the air duct above the room and saw that Robin had grown and became free during his growth spurt! So, he used his tools to cut a hole in the air duct and swung to the ground below, just as Robin woke up!

“What happened? Batman! Hey, I’m free!” Robin gasped, as he realized that he had grown just as Batman had arrived.

“NO! Get them!” Karl shouted, as Jerry, Dave and Paul arrived. All four thugs were in the fight, but against two heroes, including a much bigger and stronger version of Robin!
Batman had his hands full with Dave, the biggest thug of them all. In the meantime, Robin was busy fighting the other three men, and it was an easy fight! Robin so overpowered these men by punching them out using overwhelming strength and power, plus his intimidating size. Robin was now taller and bigger than Batman!

Finally, when the Penguin arrived, Robin leaped over him and punched him out. Batman and Robin then alerted the police and they collected the stolen paintings. Lastly, Batman got into the Batmobile and raced home. Robin, who was too big to sit in the Batmobile, he just ran home, using his superhuman strength and speed. He leaped over buildings and reached the Batcave in almost the same amount of time as it took Batman to drive home!

Once back in the Batcave, the subject of a bigger costume for the 7-foot-tall, 350-pound, super-muscular Robin came up again! Not only that, but Batman had to make Robin grow until the toxic chemicals in the Boy Wonder’s body were worn off.

The question was: How big would his final growth spurt be?
14112221.title: Robin has another growth spurt at the Penguin...

choices: Robin grows bigger, and gains a new set of legs as well!
Robin grows to a 24-foot tall muscle giant!
141122212.content:
“Batman! How much more will I keep on growing?” the large, towering Boy Wonder asked the Caped Crusader. Somehow, it felt very strange for Robin to be taller than Batman. He was so used to looking up to Batman, that it seemed weird to him, now that he was towering over his masked hero by almost a foot in height!

“Well Robin, we need to force you to grow until the growth chemical has worn out in your body! Now, let’s get you hooked up to Medcom one more time and do a body scan and see if we can get a reading!” Batman suggested to the big, tall boy.

Robin walked over to the large medical computer called Medcom, where he took several wires with suction cups and attached them to his chest, his arms and his legs. Batman flipped several switches and waited for the computer to analyze the scan of Robin’s body.

“Well, it seems like the chemical presence has only been reduced by 36 percent, so about 64 percent is remaining! That means you will have just one more significant growth spurt and then it’ll be over!” Batman explained. “So, we need to trigger a growth spurt in you and force you to grow until you can’t grow anymore!”

“Well, I may as well get it over with!” Robin smiled.

“Yeah! Take off your costume, since you’ll outgrow this for sure. We have no idea how big you’ll get after this is over!” Batman ordered.

Robin removed his mask, his gloves, his shirt and his shoes, along with his long, yellow cape. He only kept on his stretchy green briefs.

Then Batman and Robin walked over to the largest area in the Batcave, which had over 50-foot ceilings. It was a large room with big doors and high ceilings. This was the lab where batman kept scientific and computer equipment.

“Okay, Robin…” Batman said, while holding a long feather from some bird in his hand. “This will tickle a bit, but this should make you grow like crazy!”

Robin closed his eyes as Batman walked behind the boy and squatted down, rubbing the tip of the feather against the boy’s bulging calf muscles.

“Uhhmmm… That tickles like crazy!” Robin exclaimed.

Batman held a feather in each hand, and tickled both of Robin big, monster calf muscles at the same time, on both of his thick, muscular legs.

“Oooohhhhhhh…. Batman…. I… feel… it…” Robin groaned.

Then his loud groaning was followed by that familiar bone-cracking sound, which came from deep within Robin’s body. Only this time, since his body was much bigger than before, the sound was louder.

KKKKKKKKKKRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR!!!!!!!!!!

As Batman kept on rubbing the tips of the feathers against Robin’s calves, he noticed suddenly that the boy’s legs started to GROW! Batman had to stand up now, because Robin’s legs started growing longer and even MORE muscular than before, and at an alarming rate!

His calf muscles were totally EXPLODING with muscle! They practically came alive and started to swell up to giant proportions, filling out to mega-balloons! They grew larger than medicine-balls, becoming rock-hard and bigger and rounder than ever! Surely they would allow Robin to leap over tall buildings by now!

Now only did his calves grow, but his quadriceps as well! They swelled up into enormous, thick columns of large, wide and hard pillars of muscle-steel. Thick layers of veins surfaced all over them, as they grew into the biggest quads anyone had ever seen on earth! Every cyclist or runner on earth would be jealous of Robin now!

Robin’s legs continued to grow bigger and longer, making the boy grow bigger and TALLER! He was now standing 8 feet tall… 9 feet tall… 10 feet tall! Batman had to crane his neck and just stared in disbelief as he saw his partner become more of a giant, right before his very eyes!

But other things were happening to Robin as well. His torso was growing bigger, wider, taller and longer at the same time. His mighty abdominal muscles were growing even bigger and his pectorals were jutting out from his chest by over 3 feet. He was truly a giant muscle man!

His biceps and triceps were bigger than soccer balls and his arms were much bigger than anything ever seen on earth! His hands and feet were gigantic now, as the boy surpassed 13 feet in height.

Batman had to stop rubbing Robin’s legs with the feathers just because he couldn’t reach his calves anymore! His legs were now bigger than Batman’s entire body! Robin was now twice as tall as Batman!

KKKKRRRRRRRR…..

Then there was a final, great growth spurt which propelled Robin to his final height before his growth spurt stopped, leaving the giant boy panting heavily for a moment as he looked down at his diminutive partner.

“Oh my… My gosh…. I… Wow…” Robin gasped, as he tried to catch his breath.

Then, one more thing happened. Two stumps began to emerge from Robin’s torso, on either side, right below his arms. The stumps were about as big as his arms. Then, they began to grow rapidly, until they formed elbows. Finally, they grew even longer, forming wrists and then hands with fingers at the ends of them!

“Batman! Look! I just grew a second set of arms!” Robin gasped, as he moved his second set of arms around.

“Holy smoke!” Batman exclaimed. Robin had four arms, two on each side! He now had four hands, and twenty fingers!

“You just experienced a mutation, thanks to the chemicals!” Batman grinned. “The chemical was a plant growing chemical, and it caused you to grow a new set of arms!”

Robin now stood 18 feet tall, so about 3 times taller than Batman! In fact, Batman just reached past his knees and came up to his quads. Batman could easily walk under Robin’s legs now.

“Gosh, Batman! What am I gonna do? I’m so BIG!” Robin sighed.

“You’ll be fine! Let’s create a new, large costume for you! You’re so strong, that you can leap to anywhere in Gotham City! You can run faster and you can jump higher! You’ll be very useful to me! So, don’t worry about it!” Batman said to his gigantic partner.

Just then, an alarm sounded. The computer lit up! There was a robbery at a jewelry store! The robbers fled in a van and they escaped to… the chemical lab at the university!

“Oh no! Not again! They’re at that lab! That’s where that big metal drum is with that green chemical that caused me to grow in the first place!” Robin groaned.

“No problem! Just don’t fall in that drum this time!” Batman said. “Meet you there!”

Batman leaped in the Batmobile and raced over to the lab while Robin ran over the street and leaped over the rooftops of the buildings, using his mighty leg muscles. Within minutes they arrived there.

Robin walked around the large lab when he heard a noise. Then he spotted a man running down a metal bridge which was suspended over the lab site! Robin climbed a ladder and reached a platform. From there, he ran over the metal bridge, and he almost caught up to the man who was carrying a bag containing the stolen jewelry.

But the man grabbed a bottle of cleaning solution, which was standing on a shelf, and poured it all over the walkway of the bridge just as the big, towering Boy Wonder was running towards him. This caused Robin to slip, and the giant boy fell over the railing and tumbled into the big metal containing below!

“Not again!” Batman gasped, as he saw his giant friend fall into the same green liquid!

Sparks flew as the giant metal container lit up with electrical currency, sending volts of power through the green goo and through Robin’s body!

Batman threw a batarang at the robber and tied him up. Then, he tossed one at Robin, who was swimming in the chemicals! Robin grabbed hold of the cable and managed to climb out, but it wasn’t after he had spent about ten minutes swimming and soaking in the chemicals.

“Here we go again!” Batman sighed. “Robin’s gonna grow even bigger now…”

When Robin got out, he was soaking wet. He stared at Batman, who looked up to him.

“Get back to the Batcave, if you can fit through the door…” Batman grinned. “Wait for me there, okay?”

Batman got in the Batmobile as the police arrived. The robber was captured, and Batman was on his way home, wondering how big Robin would be once he got there…
141122212.title: Robin grows into a 18-foot muscle giant

choices: Robin grows another 4 feet taller, and more muscular
Robin's four legs gain more muscle!
1411222121.content:
As soon as Robin arrived at the Batcave, he rushed to the largest room in the cave, which luckily had a very high ceiling which was over 100 feet above the ground. For the time being it was high enough, although Robin began to wonder how much longer it would take before he would become that tall.

The Boy Wonder quickly removed his soaked costume before taking a long hot shower, trying desperately to remove as much of the green goo as possible, although it was already too late. Most of the green chemical had already penetrated his skin, which made him feel very nervous. This was the same chemical which made him grow several weeks earlier, and the results were amazing. Robin grew from a normal-sized guy into this gigantic super-muscular man with four arms and giant muscles. Not only did he now have four arms and four hands, along with twenty fingers, but he was over eighteen feet tall as well! He was three times as big as Batman! The Caped Crusader would now reach halfway up to his quadriceps when they talked!

What worried Robin even more was the fact that the green goo at the lab had penetrated his leg! And his legs were already long to begin with! None of the chemical was to be found anymore, so it had all entered his body! It was already circulating inside of him, building up energy for his next growth spurt!

Robin had washed himself thoroughly when he got out of the giant shower, which had been modified for his increased size. When he got out and grabbed a large towel, so he could dry himself off, he was overcome by a weird, tingling sensation. He froze in place for a moment.

“Oh no! Here it comes!” he gasped.

He quickly ran over to the large mirror, which hung against the wall.

He was expecting to see his muscles expand some more, as he moved his four thick, long muscular arms around.

But something else happened instead. His torso widened. It seemed as if his chest and stomach grew wider. His legs grew farther apart, widening the gap between them. Robin could only look at his reflection in the mirror, showing his naked but very muscular, giant body.

When it seemed like his body had widened considerably, it appeared as if there was enough room between his legs for… Two more legs!

“Hey! What… What’s happening to me?” Robin wondered out loud.

Then, two stumps began to grow from his groin, exactly between his two existing legs, which had become separated by a noticeable gap. The two stumps were exactly as wide and as thick as two new legs!

The two stumps grew longer and thicker, coming down past his existing outer legs, forming knees at the half-way point. Then, they grew even further, forming a new set of quads and a new set of calves on each leg, until they reached the end. Then, they formed the ankles, the feet, and new sets of toes.

When the growth stopped, Robin couldn’t believe what he saw. He now had four legs! He had two left feet and two right feet! His dual set of legs now matched his dual set of arms!

“Holy smoke! I got a left foot, a right foot, and another left foot and another right foot! I got four feet attached to four legs!”

Just then Batman arrived, and knocked on the door.

“Robin! Are you alright?”

“Yeah! You won’t believe this, Batman! I got four legs! I’m a total freak!” Robin shouted back. “You need to change my costume again!”

Robin put on his shirt and walked out, holding a towel around his waist. Obviously, Batman needed to create a new brief for Robin, wide enough, and with four holes…
1411222121.title: Robin grows bigger, and gains a new set of legs...

choices: He grows bigger
He fights crime
1412.content:
Robin woke the next morning. He groaned and rolled over. He looked down at his lean body, and slapped his stomach. Lean, but still no abs. He sighed as he saw a note from Bruce.

~GONE TO A BOARD MEETING~

He got up and got dressed into tracksuit bottoms and a t-shirt. He headed downstairs. Alfred had a week off, visiting family. He made himself breakfast, and tuck in hungrily.

He finished his breakfast, and headed home over to the kitchen counter. He took out a protein shake from the fridge, and proceeded to start to drink it. He finished it quickly, and headed to the home gym.

He was in the gym when he felt a tingling sensation in his calves. He planted his feet firmly, and his calves began to grow. Slowly but surely, inch by inch. He moaned as thick, defined muscle piled itself onto his lower legs. The muscle now protruded out the back of his legs massively, stretching his tracksuit bottoms to the limit.

The growth moved up his legs to his quadriceps. The already defined muscle began to expand, layers and layers of hard muscle piling on. There was a loud tearing sound as the muscle ripped through his tracksuit, turning them into shorts that rode up above his quads.

He tilted his head back and moaned loudly as the muscle on his firm ass began to balloon out. It kept going and going until it tore through his shorts, making them shred. It revealed a ridiculously stretched pair of boxer shorts. The shorts were stretched out the back, and the front began to fill as well as two massive cords of muscle ran down his stomach in a V, filling the waistband of the shorts to breaking limit.

He felt a tingle in his upper stomach, and moaned as a line appeared down his stomach. The small bit of fat melted away, revealing this line straight down. At the top, just below his chest, two cinder blocks emerged from his stomach. Another row emerged below it, and another, and another. He stared in awe at his brand new 8 pack abs, which were straining so hard that he could see them through his t-shirt. His obliques also pushed out, stretching the fabric to breaking point.

His small pecs began to expand,bigger and bigger.they swelled in every direction,out to his arms and up to his neck. When they filled that space,they began to grow outwards. He laughed as they tore through his shirt, and kept going, big, rock hard mounds of muscle, separated by a deep line. His lats flared out to perfectly frame them.

He heard a creaking noise as his back widened. Large, ripped pockets of muscle swelled across it, tearing through his t-shirt. His traps expanded, and his neck thickened greatly.

His hands started to grow, becoming heavier. The growth moved up his forearms as they swelled into thick,sinewy muscle. He gasped as his biceps and triceps expanded as well, nearing 20". He flexed them both, as his shoulders grew wider and wider apart.

Finally, his now massive body decided to put the young boy through puberty all at once. His small testicles swelled to the size of soft balls, and began to manufacture massive amounts of testosterone. This caused his penis to elongate so much that it burst through his pants.

Beast Boy
